Item.method_code:
' name: SQL onAfterUpdate ' created: 5-OCT-2005 George J. Carrette 'MethodTemplateName=VBScriptMain;
Sub Main(inDom As XmlDocument,outDom As XmlDocument,Iob As Object,Svr As Object,Ses As Object) cco.xml.setitemproperty(cco.xml.GetRequestItem(indom),"PROCESS","onAfterUpdate") cco.applyitem.ExecuteMethodByName(indom,outdom,"SQL PROCESS",True) End Sub
Item.name: SQL onAfterUpdate
